author: tobrien
title: Paperless Cross-Border Trade
description: Developing countries face challenges realizing the massive benefits of paperless-trade due to the high price tag of software and expertise.
solution: Moving the TradeTrust interoperability framework to Cardano to facilitate low cost trusted interoperability of electronic trade documents.
experience: Our team has 30 years of cross-border trade thought leadership and blockchain design with a team of 15 experienced blockchain engineers.
